definition: to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: The overall cost depends on whether there is an index on the join columns.
sentences.chinese: 总成本取决于连接列上是否有索引。

sentences.english: Lowering total costs related to purchasing equipment.
sentences.chinese: 降低购买设备的总成本。

sentences.english: Many companies later evolved into looking at total landed costs with the on-set of global trade.
sentences.chinese: 许多公司后来演变成寻找降落在总成本上的全球贸易。

sentences.english: The total cost of stocks purchased should be debited to an investment account.
sentences.chinese: 购入股票的总成本应借记投资账户。

sentences.english: The total cost of ownership involves the total costs of entire E-procurement period.
sentences.chinese: 总所有权成本关注整个电子采购周期的总成本。

sentences.english: ROI expressed as a percentage is total benefit divided by total cost.
sentences.chinese: ROI表示为总收益除以总成本的百分比。

sentences.english: High performance video decoders ideally have to minimize the overall system costs.
sentences.chinese: 高性能视频解码器原则上必须尽可能降低系统总成本。

sentences.english: Please include your hourly rate and total cost of project. How do you like to get paid?
sentences.chinese: 请包括您的时薪和项目总成本。你怎么想获得报酬？

sentences.english: That helps drive down the total ownership cost of the platforms and provides enhanced acoustic capability to the fleet.
sentences.chinese: 这有助于降低平台的总成本，并增强舰队的声波性能。

sentences.english: What are other factors of the total cost for the "China price"?
sentences.chinese: 其他组成“中国产品价格”总成本的有哪些因素？

definition: expenditures/expenses/CL:筆|笔[bi3], 項|项[xiang4]/to spend money/(coll.) to pay wages
